channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- OpenBMC
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- OpenBMC

item.title: CVE-2021-38961|2024-08-04T01:51:20.705Z -- ibm -- openbmc
item.description: IBM OPENBMC OP910 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 212049.

item.title: CVE-2021-38960|2024-08-04T01:51:20.780Z -- ibm -- openbmc
item.description: IBM OPENBMC OP920, OP930, and OP940 could allow an unauthenticated user to obtain sensitive information. IBM X-Force ID: 212047.

item.title: CVE-2024-31916|2024-07-03T19:40:31.697Z -- ibm -- openbmc
item.description: IBM OpenBMC FW1050.00 through FW1050.10 BMCWeb HTTPS server component could disclose sensitive URI content to an unauthorized actor that bypasses authentication channels. IBM X-ForceID: 290026.

item.title: CVE-2024-31916|2024-06-27T17:45:31.618Z -- ibm -- openbmc
item.description: IBM OpenBMC FW1050.00 through FW1050.10 BMCWeb HTTPS server component could disclose sensitive URI content to an unauthorized actor that bypasses authentication channels. IBM X-ForceID: 290026.

item.title: CVE-2024-31916|2024-08-02T01:59:50.705Z -- ibm -- openbmc
item.description: IBM OpenBMC FW1050.00 through FW1050.10 BMCWeb HTTPS server component could disclose sensitive URI content to an unauthorized actor that bypasses authentication channels. IBM X-ForceID: 290026.
